io.spine.tools.archive

Class ArchiveFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.archive.ArchiveFile

  • public final class ArchiveFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a archive file contents. The file represented by an instance of this type is of one of the ArchiveExtensions, i.e. a ZIP or a JAR.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<ArchiveEntry> findByExtension(java.lang.String fileExtension)
      Finds a ZIP entry with the given name according to ZipEntry.getName().
      static ArchiveFile from(java.io.File file)
      Wraps the given File into an ArchiveFile.
      static boolean isArchive(java.io.File file)
      Defines if the given file is acknowledged as an archive or not.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public static ArchiveFile from(java.io.File file)
        Wraps the given File into an ArchiveFile.

        If the file does not exist or is not an archive, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        A file may be considered an archive if it has one of ArchiveExtensions.

        Parameters:
        file - the archive file
        Returns:
        new instance

      • findByExtension

        public java.util.Collection<ArchiveEntry> findByExtension(java.lang.String fileExtension)
        Finds a ZIP entry with the given name according to ZipEntry.getName().
        Parameters:
        fileExtension - file extension to look for; must start with a dot (.)
        Returns:
        the found entry or Optional.empty() if there is no such entry in this archive

      • isArchive

        public static boolean isArchive(java.io.File file)
        Defines if the given file is acknowledged as an archive or not.
        Parameters:
        file - file to check
        Returns:
        true if the file is an archive, false otherwise
